justification: Vendor 2 demonstrates support for 'immersive visualization of Digital Twins using Unity, Unreal Engine,' and enables 'system interaction via game-like experiences,' which aligns with the requirement to 'create immersive virtual worlds and interactive experiences with gaming engine technology.' Interfaces with relevant standards and SDK integrations are described. However, the level of user interactivity and real-time experience details are not fully elaborated, slightly limiting explicit completeness.
ability: The ability to create immersive virtual worlds and interactive experiences with gaming engine technology
